text: Vetattaiyutaiyavarkalil perumpalanavarkal nampikkaiyalarkalakiya unkalai nirakarippavarkalaka marrivita ventume! Enru virumpukirarkal. Avarkalukku unmai (innatenat) telivakat terinta pinnum ivvaru avarkal virumpuvatan karanamellam avarkalukku (unkal mitu)lla poramaitan. Akave, allahvutaiya (marroru) kattalai varumvarai (avarkalai) ninkal mannittum purakkanittum varunkal. Niccayamaka allah anaittin mitum mikavum perarralutaiyavan avan
